About me

The volcano in the main page is the place where I grew up. Now I live in London.

I’m a freelance software developer working as a Clojure consultant in London and teaching at Coderwave.

I develop and maintain Roundabout.io - London Startup Map.

I’m @_sarhus on Twitter, and you can reach me at rosario@roundabout.io.
